issue.title: Cloudsim performance insufficient to run stable control loops

content.raw: When I know it is deployed I will try some runs.  I have been limiting the realtime performance to slower than 1x by adding multiple robots and that has not resolved the issues.  What type of instance is the solution docker running on?
content.html: When I know it is deployed I will try some runs. I have been limiting the realtime performance to slower than 1x by adding multiple robots and that has not resolved the issues. What type of instance is the solution docker running on?
